messages.subject: Unschoolers' Big Dreams
messages.msgSnippet: ... I d like to see lots about this one.   Tia They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary saftety deserve neither liberty nor
messages.messageBody:
> THIS is the kind of thing we can talk about. See, you don't have to be
> some "perfect" unschooler to talk about substantive stuff here - this
> issue of kids having big dreams, but apparently not "getting it" that
> there are things they have to do to fulfill those dreams - this is
> something that lots of unschooling parents have to figure out how to
> handle.
>
> Good topic for us to chew on.

I'd like to see lots about this one. <g>
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...
